entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 14. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 14 April 2023
